text: it was really the Golden Age of boxing
for heavyweights he showed a discipline
for training that was kind of
unparalleled Muhammad's real gift was
his his positive attitude he always said
that heavyweight fighters are fighters
champions there there must be a will and
a way and the the skill has to be great
in order to be a champion but the will
must be greater than the skill he once
so many fights in the 15th round when he
was exhausted and the other fighter was
exhausted but Ali managed always to find
a way to win
in the history of athletics I don't
think there's been anybody else that had
the power and the heroism of what he did
in the ring but he also stood for
motivating and helping and encouraging
many generations all people around the
world but I think there was a special
place for him in the hearts and minds of
African Americans
